definitions.example: I don't care who gets it; give it to whoever.

definitions.definition: Misspelling of who ever other than in interrogative use.
definitions.example: *He is the tallest man whoever lived. (incorrect usage)

definitions.definition: An underground railway, especially for mass transit of people in urban areas.
A train that runs on such an underground railway.
A rapid transit system, regardless of the elevation of its right of way.
An underground walkway, tunnel for pedestrians (called pedestrian underpass in US).
An underground route for pipes, sewers, etc.
To travel by underground railway.
A dried stalk of a cereal plant.
Such dried stalks considered collectively.
A drinking straw.
A pale, yellowish beige colour, like that of a dried straw.
Anything proverbially worthless; the least possible thing.
To lay straw around plants to protect them from frost.
To sell straws on the streets in order to cover the giving to the purchaser of things usually banned, such as pornography.
Made of straw.
definitions.example: straw hat

definitions.definition: Of a pale, yellowish beige colour, like that of a dried straw.
Imaginary, but presented as real.
definitions.example: A straw enemy built up in the media to seem like a real threat, which then collapses like a balloon.

definitions.definition: To raise or rise.
definitions.example: The fog eventually lifted, leaving the streets clear.

definitions.definition: To steal.
To source directly without acknowledgement; to plagiarise.
To arrest (a person).
To remove (a ban, restriction, etc.).
To alleviate, to lighten (pressure, tension, stress, etc.)
To cause to move upwards.
To lift weights; to weight-lift.
definitions.example: She lifts twice a week at the gym.

definitions.definition: To try to raise something; to exert the strength for raising or bearing.
To elevate or improve in rank, condition, etc.; often with up.
To bear; to support.
To collect, as moneys due; to raise.
To transform (a function) into a corresponding function in a different context.
To buy a security or other asset previously offered for sale.
Raised up; held aloft.
Stolen.
The human race in its entirety.
Men collectively, as opposed to all women.
Human feelings; humanity.
(with "the") Something uncertain.
Not certain; unsure.
Not known for certain; questionable.
definitions.example: Tomorrow's weather is uncertain.

definitions.definition: Not yet determined; undecided.
Variable and subject to change.
Fitful or unsteady.
Unpredictable or capricious.
Any of several shrubs or trees of the genus Citrus in the family Rutaceae.

The fruit of such plants, generally spherical, oblate, or prolate, consisting of an outer glandular skin (called zest), an inner white skin (called pith or albedo), and generally between 8 and 16 sectors filled with pulp consisting of cells with one end attached to the inner skin. Citrus fruits include orange, grapefruit, lemon, lime, and citron.
Of or relating to citrus plants or fruit.
A chief or superior.
Supreme; highest; chief.
Of the highest importance.
definitions.example: Getting those credit cards paid off is paramount.

definitions.definition: The visible outline of a woman's labia or vulva, as a consequence of wearing tight pants.
To wear a piece of clothing such that the outline of the labia is visible.
